```{r}
library(shiny)
library(htmltools)
library(nycflights13)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyverse)
library(jsonlite)
library(RCurl)
library(httr)
library(leaflet)
```

```{r}
world <- read_csv("cleanData.csv")
```

Column {data-width=600}
-------------------------------------
    
### Component 1
    
```{r}

pal <- colorNumeric(
  palette = colorRampPalette(c('red', 'green'))(length(world$aqi)), 
  domain = world$aqi)

leaflet() %>%
  setView(lat = 0, lng = 0, zoom = 2) %>% 
  addTiles() %>%
  addCircleMarkers(
    lat = world$lat,
    lng = world$lng,
    color = pal(world$aqi),
    stroke = FALSE, 
    fillOpacity = 0.5,
    popup = world$aqi
  )

```
